resources.string: Are you sure do you want to go back ?
That will make you lose your current game…
Error to connect, check your internet please
Error to connect, check your internet please
Congratulations you discovered your opponent password in
Your opponent was faster… but do not give up try again !!
Type your password and click in send…
Now discover the password of you opponent, type your attempt…
Waiting password of opponent to start the game
Error - to do that action you need to be connected
Guess is a simple logic game, your objective is to find out the password of your opponent with as few attempts as possible, for that you have the help of your hacker cellphone
the first step is log in with your google account and choose the type of game: SinglePlayer or MultiPlayer
Singleplayer: the cellphone will create a random password and your objective is to discover it
Multiplayer: you will make your password and your opponent his, once the game start discover the password of your opponent before him discover yours
*The password always has 4 digits and never has repeated digits \nWrong Examples: 1224,12345,142 \nRight Examples: 1739,1234,5678
That is your keyboard, use it to type your attempts
After type your guess you must click on that button so your hacker cellphone can help you saying how close your attempt is from the real password
That is your help bar use it to mark the numbers you are sure exits in the real password and the numbers you are sure does not exist

After typing your attempt the cellphone will help you as said before, to help you the cellphone use a simple system that can identify if any digit of your attempt exist in the password of your opponent and if it is in the correct or wrong position
to tell you that information the cellphone uses two symbols:
- mean you accepted one number of the password but in the wrong position:
The number 4 is part of the password but in your attempt is in the wrong position that is why the system answer is:
- means you accepted one number of the password in the right position:\n
The number 4 is part of the password and in your attempt is in the right position that is why the system answer is:

Got it? Watch below one more example 
Opponent's Password: 4 6 5 3
 Your attempt: 4 5 8 6
The number 4 like before exits in the password and is in the right position, The numbers 5 and 6 also exits in the password but are in the wrong position
Tip: when the hacker system answer is empty means none of the numbers in your attempt exist in the password, do not forget to mark that down on the help bar.
Let\'s see how to use each element of the screen

On the multiplayer match there are two different types:

 Find a Match - That will find an random opponent
 
 Challenge a friend - You can challenge a friend or someone close to you
 
 At the invitations screen you will see the invitations that friends sent to you to accept click on SEE MORE and ACCEPT:
You always can turn off or turn on the song here
Click here to see your achievements \n*Unlock achievements increse your point in the ranking
Click here to visualize your position in the ranking
You are connected make sure to keep your internet connection to unlock new achievements
You are not connected you will not be able to unlock new achievements
ERROR - Você ou seu opponente está sem conexão
Do you want to cancel the auto connection ? (is highly recommended to click NO for a best game experience)
You are not connected your points will not be updated
Failed to sign in. Please check your network connection and try again.

The application is incorrectly configured. Check that the package name and signing certificate match the client ID created in Developer Console. Also, if the application is not yet published, check that the account you are trying to sign in with is listed as a tester account. See logs for more information.
We are reconnecting you - Try again
Do you want to do thetutorial first ? (It is highly recommended to click YES)
digit(s) at the correct position and
O- digits at the right position
X- digits at the wrong position
Por favor, atualize ou instale os google play services antes de usar o aplicativo.
